overview: Melody is perfectly cast to help catch online predators, luring old creeps to the house. Once the rest of the crew leaves, Cody and Jake know she's a total slut and decide to put her to work for real. Gabbie has made a deal, and it's time to pay up. With a remote-controlled vibrating egg in her teen pussy, she takes commands excellently as her controller watches from a window across the street. When Jill stopped at a full-service station, she wasn't expecting quite this level of service! Zoe is a new young call-girl at the agency, and she's not used to getting customers that look like Chad.
title: To Watch a Predator
